description:
Replacement of the existing main entrance doors to 16 houses and removal of brick balcony fronts and replacement with metal railings. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  02059/01 (site location). Typical estate internal block elevation (photo). Existing site photographs                         1-4. Typical Internal elevation illustration. Existing communal balconies (photo).  Balcony sketch  proposal; 02059/03; 2513A07.  Site                         Location Plan (balcony locations) unnumbered. (LBI Reg. No:28051,28052)
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of five years from the date of this permission. 

 REASON: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990
